text:
Sorry to bother you while you're busy...!
I'm here for an interview. I'm Chiyoko Sonoda.

Could I have just
a little bit of your time...?

Yes! I'll be the representative...
Please, go ahead.

Oh, I see...! I always imagined that strong clubs practiced every
day, so it's surprising to hear that you have days off...!"
It would be troublesome if pushing too hard led to injuries.

Um...
Is there anything else you "value"?

Well, let's see... Probably...
"Finding things enjoyable", I suppose.

For that reason, we communicate without distinctions
between seniors and juniors.

I've never met you before, but I've known Houkura for a while!
You all seem so friendly... and your teamwork is outstanding.

They're always being interviewed with smiles on their faces, making
everyone smile wherever they go... I want to be a captain like that too.

Hehe... With you as captain,
I'm sure you'll absolutely, definitely make it!

Thank you...!
In that case, let's capture that enthusiastic captain in a photo!
